aspects.name: Electricity Consumption
aspects.description: Use of electricity for office operations and digital infrastructure.

impacts.description: Increased greenhouse gas emissions contributing to climate change.

controls: Encourage power-saving modes for office equipment

aspects.name: Business Travel
aspects.description: Travel by employees for client meetings and conferences.

impacts.description: Emission of CO2 and other pollutants from transportation.

controls: Offset unavoidable air travel emissions via certified carbon credits
legal_requirements: UK Corporate Carbon Reporting (Streamlined Energy and Carbon Reporting)

aspects.name: Office Water Usage
aspects.description: Consumption of water for sanitation, cooling, and cleaning systems.

impacts.description: Depletion of local water resources and increased wastewater load.

aspects.name: Wastewater Discharge
aspects.description: Effluent from office facilities and cooling systems.

impacts.description: Potential contamination of local water bodies.

controls: Proper maintenance of drainage and cooling systems
monitoring_metrics: Compliance reports from local water authorities

aspects.name: Waste Disposal
aspects.description: Disposal of office waste, including electronic waste.

impacts.description: Potential leaching of hazardous substances into soil.

legal_requirements: Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment (WEEE) Regulations

aspects.name: Chemical Handling
aspects.description: Use and storage of cleaning agents and printer toners.

impacts.description: Risk of soil contamination if spills occur.

legal_requirements: Control of Substances Hazardous to Health (COSHH) Regulations 2002

aspects.name: Office Lighting and HVAC
aspects.description: Energy consumption for lighting and heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

impacts.description: Increased energy demand leading to higher emissions.

legal_requirements: UK Energy Performance of Buildings Regulations

aspects.name: Digital Infrastructure
aspects.description: Energy use by servers and data centers hosting digital platforms.

impacts.description: High energy consumption contributing to carbon footprint.

controls: Consolidate workloads to reduce server redundancy
legal_requirements: UK Streamlined Energy and Carbon Reporting (SECR)

aspects.name: Office Equipment Noise
aspects.description: Noise from printers, servers, and HVAC systems.

impacts.description: Potential disturbance to employees and nearby community.

controls: Regular maintenance to reduce operational noise
legal_requirements: UK Control of Noise at Work Regulations 2005

aspects.name: Construction or Renovation Activities
aspects.description: Noise from office upgrades or building work.

impacts.description: Disturbance to local environment and community.

aspects.name: Office Space Layout

impacts.description: Improper design can affect health, safety, and productivity.

controls: Optimize natural lighting and air circulation
legal_requirements: UK Health and Safety at Work Act 1974

aspects.name: Building Maintenance
aspects.description: Maintenance of physical infrastructure including roofs, flooring, and furniture.

impacts.description: Poor maintenance may increase waste or require replacement more frequently.

aspects.name: Electronic Devices
aspects.description: EMF emissions from servers, monitors, and Wi-Fi routers.

impacts.description: Potential minor health effects and regulatory compliance requirements.

controls: Follow recommended distance and exposure guidelines
Limit use of high-emission devices in shared spaces
legal_requirements: UK Health Protection Agency EMF guidelines
monitoring_metrics: Incident reports related to EMF exposure

aspects.name: Satellite Communication Equipment
aspects.description: Use of antennas and radio transmitters for space-related services.

impacts.description: Requires compliance with radiation and frequency regulations.

controls: Operate equipment according to manufacturer guidelines
